contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Sitana'' | image = Sitana_ponticeriana.jpg | image_width = 240px | image_caption = ''[[Sitana ponticeriana]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | subordo = [[Lacertilia]] | familia = [[Agamidae]] | subfamilia = [[Agaminae]] | genus = '''''Sitana''''' }} '''''Sitana''''' is a genus of [[lizard]] from the family [[Agamidae]] found in [[Nepal]] and [[India]], [[Sri Lanka]] and [[Pakistan]]. ==Species== Listed alphabetically.<ref>[http://reptile-database.reptarium.cz/search.php?taxon=&genus=Sitana&submit=Search ''Sitana''], The Reptile Database</ref> *''[[Sitana fusca]]'' Schleich & Kästle, 1998 *''[[Sitana ponticeriana]]'' Cuvier, 1829 – (Blue) Fan-throated Lizard *''[[Sitana schleichi]]'' Anders & Kästle, 2002 *''[[Sitana sivalensis]]'' Schleich, Kästle & Shah, 1998 ==References== {{commons}} {{wikispecies}} {{reflist}} [[Category:Agamidae]]
